reviews.review: ปิงเยอะ
herşeyi çok güzel hll

クソゲー。
バランス崩壊していて、今更キラーの新規は求められてない。
キラーは上位者を基準に調整されているから、常にキラーは勝ちにくいようにされてる。

鯖は大切。
4人集まらないとゲームが始まらないからね。
キラーは１人いれば十分。

鯖が楽しい、鯖が勝ちやすい
全ては人数を確保するため。
運営は多分そう考えてる。
だから、キラーは一部のすごく上手い人だけでも十分ゲームが回る。
だけど、うまいキラーはそれでも勝てちゃうから鯖は楽しくなくなる
これの繰り返し。

今更新規がどうのこうの言うこと自体が間違ってる。
新規は求められてない。

新規のキラーが一度マッチに参加すれば、ライトチカチカ、屈伸、連続乗り越え、チャットで暴言
キラーが弱いからね。仕方ないね。
そういうのに対して通報とかはないから安心して煽り散らせる。

そういうゲーム。
立場の弱い人を徹底的にいたぶって満足できる人なら、鯖でプレイすれば非常に楽しく遊べるゲーム。
群れて一人を徹底的にいじめ抜くのが好き！！！っていうような人格破綻者に激烈おすすめなゲームだけど、
俺らみたいな一般人には到底おすすめできないゲーム。

二度とやるか。こんなクソゲー。

追記
キラーに人権は無いです。
何をされてもどんなことを言われても鯖様を否定することは許されません。
man hat spaß und angst mit freunden

НУ и кусок дерьма,а не игра. Понятное дело, что с балансом тут не дружат (4 членососа-выживших будут тибегать и носится с фонариком. Да, концепт игры перевернут наглухо), но 2 момента, по каким причинам играть в эту парашу не стоит:

1. Гринд и монетизация. Просто дичь, что купив игру за фулл-прайс (чёрт с ним, какое издание) - ты обязан вкачивать айтемы. Для каждой партии. Ну т.е. если нет времени задрачивать одного и того-же маньяка - то хрена лысого тебе, а не вкачанные на максимум перки бусты. 

2. Читеры. Столкнулся с одним утырком, который бежит определённое кол-во метров и ХОБА - оказывается за спиной. Я ливнул сразу, проклянув его семью (какой-то чёрт начал оправдывать, что это лагает он...Привет всем уйгурам, что с пингом 200 играют в мультиплеерные игры. Не вылезайте из своей деревни и пасите коров, черти). Только хотел кинуть репорт и понял, что можно забить. Ибо форма подачи репортов - как налоговая декларация в МФЦ, бабок в очереди только не хватает. Спрашивается - на кой ляд у вас античит стоит? ну понятно на какой- на какой насосали, на такой и стоит. 

Жалею о потраченных часах и желаю задохнуться от жадности создателям этого высера.

Очень интересная игра, но если вы фанат хоррор фильмов как и я, то готовьте деньги. Играть можно и без доната, для открытия персонажей от самих разработчиков нужно много фармить, а вот персонажи из фильмов исключительно за донат. В целом очень хорошая игра с интересным геймплеем!

Um bom jogo de coop thriller, diria que é um dos melhores desse desse gênero 4 vs 1 e o mais popular. É divertido jogar com sobrevivente e o assassinos, tenho esse jogo desde ps4/ps5, embora as configurações gráficas sejam um pouco melhores 1 ponto para o PC, mas diria 1 ponto para o console que seria um bem particular... confesso que tenho minha dificuldade para dar meu loop 360 graus no PC que no console era bem mais fácil, mas isso é questão de mobilidade minha como survivor, antes de falar, assassinos são bons e extravagante de se jogar também, no inicio será complicado( e continua.. só piora hehe), Mas se tiver paciência tanto para jogar e aprender quanto para ouvir xingamentos de sobreviventes(que irrita um pouco, só dar um GG e seja educado, confia) você pode se tornar um bom Killer. No geral é um jogo bom e que roda crossplayer com outras plataformas, queria que a progressão fosse também multiplataforma, tinha bastante progressão no PS. Enfim, recomendo o jogo, o preço é acessível e justa ao jogo e entra em promoção o tempo todo.

A small yet fun game, a game where 5 plays play with one another, one is a killer the other 4 are survivors. The killers job is to kill these survivors, while the survivors job is to finish generators to escape, sounds easy enough right? I believe that sure it might sound easy but instead this is a complex game where stealth and great awareness skills can be recognized here, I would recommend this game, not for its skins or just to make you waste your money but instead to allow you to have a good time because honestly I did have a great time playing.

Pros:
1）人物动作 动画 建模 以及不同的追击音乐做的都很用心了
2）对新手人类来说是恐怖游戏，等熟悉了技能机制以后就可以快乐博弈了
3）可以当换装游戏玩:D
Cons:
1）素质低的玩家，比如摆烂人类还有守尸屠夫，确实会影响游戏体验
2）人类开黑会很快乐，但是屠夫如果不是特别会玩的就容易脑溢血了
3）血点太肝了= =
本人玩屠夫心态非常平和，人类太菜会放人走，大门开了会放树上的倒霉蛋走（除了特别皮的），反正只要BBQ叠满就可以（血点奴隶）因为已经拿到了传奇杀手的成就，所以现在玩屠夫以整活为主。如果要入坑的话先从人类开始玩吧，玩屠夫好胜心太强的话没两把刷子脑袋真的涨的很哈哈哈哈，硬要守尸保证人头的话，吃相难看出来还有可能被人骂噢，建议守尸玩家退一步大家都开心

THIS game. Can be so infuriating from both sides (Killer and Survivor).
But you build the patience and persistence. It's a very unique online horror game where your objective is how it is in any horror game or movie. You either survive, or you kill. But within those objectives you have more goals that lead up to the main course, which makes up the bacon of this product. I really love this game regardless of me getting butt hurt now and then. It's full of iconic killers and survivors we all know and love as well as original and new faces we see with depth and story behind them. Dwight in particular is my favourite survior. A lot of people play as whoever they really connect with personally. The artistry within all the portrayals of each character and map are very exquisite. Dead by daylight is a very interesting and fun place, each asset made with care. BUT of course there are frustrations. (reAD my long explanation below if you wish.)

Kiliing:
Killing is not as easy as it would seem. You have a lot of power, but it depends on you whether or not your the boss of the show. You really have to assert yourself and warn the survivors your not going to let them go so easily. It can be very painful to not kill a single survivor in a match and have the rest of them taunt you before they escape. So you have to be fierce and ready for it. Detecting each survivors perks and add ons, as well as how many times you've hooked them and what item they might be carrying. You have a lot of possibilities for strong gameplay with so many different perks, add-ons and your particular killer. Learn them well and you'll be a sooper scary lad. (Everything gets very familiar after a while)

Surviving:
Dying to the killer can either be fair n square, or it can be bullshit. If your doing good and know your surroundings and abilities you can make it out of a trail with minor difficulty. Of course even when you do good you can make mistakes that will lead to your demise BUT, there are certain circumstances whereas you will be ultimately overpowered, cornered and destroyed. That could be either because the killer is very smart, or because they are making bold decisions like face camping or tunneling without reason. There are things a killer will resort to for a successful game, but some killers will just go out of their way to do it. You have to really know what your doing, as in who your going up against, detecting their perks and add ons, and the map your on. As well as how many risks you can take and how many sacrifices you can make. There is 3 other members working alongside you, but be smart with your decisions. 

Bugs n flaws/WEIRD things that u mighnt understand:
Your playing as killer and you grab a survivor, it SHOWS the animation for a split second but it turns out you didn't actually grab them and they get away. Your running away from the killer, it might seem like your far enough from them to not get hit but they manage to hit you even though you only saw them hit the air. 
The hitboxes can look pretty freaky. It gets annoying but it's actually just something you can't actually see as a survivor. It's also more reason to play like a smart cookie. If one of your perks doesn't activate (On both Killer and Survivor), you probably didn't read them properly and they are conflicting with another perk or the opposing teams perks/add ons. Some character we are familiar with aren't always portrayed like we would hope. Jill from the resident evil chapter is quite a disappointment among fans. Her model is not as prim as other models in other crossovers or the original itself. Characters from movies don't look quite right. Quinten Smith in particular looks nothing like his actor. He has even had a face lift. But he looks like an entirely different character. This is a consistent thing in dbd. But they do us justice in some cases like the stranger things chapter. 

Ranks: 
Ranks are very void and have no actual meaning in this game tbh. Because everyone is automatically ranked but thats not the actual issue. It's that the ranking system is scuffed. You'll be a low rank killer going up against maxed ranked survivors all the time and vise versa. They have tried to fix this issue numerous times but it always ends up the same. But your rank doesn't always define how good you are either. They are not difficult to get. They are actually rather easy to obtain so long you play the game. Ranks are unpredictable. 

Killer vs Survivor:
Look, the game is very survivor sided. The devs will respond to the survivors more often than the killers and that shows throughout the games patch and fix history. We're pretty sure they don't actually experience their own game like everyone else. Killer perks and powers will be nerfed and survivors will get buffed. The devs do not ignore killers though. They have provided salvation. Aftermatch when you've killed all survivors, they are very likely to complain about your gameplay without realising the difficulty of juggling 4 different people in game. Killers can do this to survivors too its just normal competitive emotions in games. Just prepare for emotionally hurt people.
